concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 谢尔顿（常见英文姓氏或人名）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname or given name in English-speaking countries. Notable bearers include Sheldon Cooper, the fictional physicist from the TV series 'The Big Bang Theory'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作英语国家的姓氏或名字。著名人物包括美剧《生活大爆炸》中的虚构物理学家谢尔顿·库珀。
definitions.example_en: Sheldon Cooper is known for his brilliant mind and eccentric personality.
definitions.example_cn: 谢尔顿·库珀以其聪慧的头脑和古怪的性格而闻名。
